sub_title: HRBP | DE&I | Talent Development | Podcast Host (LearnFM) | Certified Yoga Teacher | Life Coach
summary:
What will the future bring? What drives people? How can I help make the lives of others better and easier? These are just some of the questions that pop into my head every day. I am intrigued by what the future holds for organizations and people. I believe that it is important for us to constantly learn and grow, so that we can be ready to sail the tides that may come our way. I am always fascinated with the latest trends and technology, always ready to give new things a try!

My background lies in presenting, teaching, marketing and events. Being a people-person, I love connecting with people and offering help wherever I can. I found my true calling to become a HR professional when I became an executive recruiter. As an advocate for constant learning and development, I am always cheering myself and others around me on to embrace a growth mindset. 

My philosophy is simple, there’s always something to learn from everyone and every experience. I look forward to connecting with you!

Educators will have to address these issues to make a difference in the education experience of every individual. At Mind On Education, we have the ambition, we have the expertise. What connects the two is our dedication to teach."
